page.title: 14THE FORESTDALE FORUM
page.content: The Forestdale Forum is like a Community Centre for the Forestdale Estate. Many activities take place there like ballet, keep fit, nursery school,autumn club,craft fairs, jumble sales.Most of us go to the Youth Club which is held on Friday Evenings.There is also a bar which the Resident Club use. This is open in the evenings and at lunch times.The public are able to hire the hall for special occasions such as weddings. The Forum is situated at the bottom of Bardolph Avenue. Steve Little who runs the Youth Club holds children's partys and does Forestdale Sound Discos.The Forum has a Car Park of it's own that the public can use. The nursery school is held every day from 9 until 12 noon. The name Forum is used just as it used to be in Roman times. That is a place for local people to meet.By Tracey C.
